title: Rock & Role
description: Diana has always dreamed about being on camera . . . and now, she might get her chance!  On her way to drop off a super-cool vest for a Cinderella Cleaners client, Diana happens to meet pop star Tasha Kane. Tasha invites Diana to try out for a role in her new video, and Diana is beyond excited. But there's one big Tasha wants the video to feature the rockin' vest ... which doesn't belong to Diana!  Can Diana have her superstar moment before the clock strikes midnight?
author: Maya Gold
